directions: Beat cream cheese, 1 cup whipped topping, and confectioners' sugar together in a bowl; spread into the prepared graham cracker crust.
Whisk chocolate pudding mix and milk together in a bowl; pour over the cream cheese layer before it has a chance to set. Refrigerate until pudding sets, about 10 minutes.
Top pie with 1 cup whipped topping; refrigerate at least 1 hour more before serving.
ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese (such as Philadelphia®), softened
1 cup frozen whipped topping (such as Cool Whip®), thawed
2 (3.9 ounce) packages instant chocolate pudding mix
1 cup frozen whipped topping (such as Cool Whip®), thawed - or to taste
title: Mom's Secret Chocolate Pie
